operators

Class ShapeDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • operators.ShapeDrawer

  • public class ShapeDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class ShapeDrawer. Draws shape to Graphics2D object with given size, color, thickness and opacity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShapeDrawer

        public ShapeDrawer(int shapeID,
           int size,
           float thick,
           float opa,
           java.awt.Color shapeColor)
        Instantiates a new shape drawer. Sets the isPreview to true and causes to print the marking without thick lines.
        Parameters:
        shapeID - the shape id
        size - the size
        thick - the thick
        opa - the opa
        shapeColor - the shape color

      • ShapeDrawer

           float opacity,
           java.awt.Color shapeColor)
        Instantiates a new shape drawer.
        Parameters:
        ml - the MarkingLayer
        size - the size of shape
        thick - the thickness of shape
        opacity - the opacity of shape
        shapeColor - the shape color
